stack.title: My favorite stack
stack.next: Modern React framework, Next offers me optimized performance and fast rendering thanks to server-side rendering (SSR) and static site generation (SSG). Moreover, Next allows me to create fullstack applications.
stack.tailwind: For styling, Tailwind offers an excellent compromise between simplicity, speed and performance
stack.typescript: Thanks to TypeScript I create robust code, while making maintenance easier for me.
stack.prisma: Flexible and easy to integrate, the combination of BetterAuth and Prisma allows me to easily manage authentication and database access.
